partialReflection.note: Amotivation and External Regulation reflected so high = positive. Intrinsic Motivation unchanged.

intrinsic_motivation.label: Intrinsic Motivation
intrinsic_motivation.note: High = strong intrinsic motivation. SD unchanged.

external_regulation.label: External Regulation (Reflected)
external_regulation.note: Reflected: 8 - 3.25 = 4.75. High score = LOW external regulation (positive — more autonomous). SD unchanged.

amotivation.label: Amotivation (Reflected)
amotivation.note: Reflected: 8 - 2.15 = 5.85. High score = LOW amotivation (positive — more motivated). SD unchanged.

clinicalFlag.note: Amotivation raw ≥ 4.0 flagged as clinical concern (≈1.7 SD above normative mean). In reflected terms, this is ≤ 4.0 reflected.

rai.note: The Relative Autonomy Index (RAI = 2×IM + 0×ER + -2×Amot) is computed on ORIGINAL (unreflected) scores. RAI range: -14 to +14. Positive = net autonomous motivation.

tScoreExample.description: Student scores raw item-mean of 3.5 on Amotivation
tScoreExample.calculation: Reflected = 8 - 3.5 = 4.5. T = 50 + 10 × ((4.5 - 5.85) / 1.10) = 50 + 10 × (-1.23) = 37.7 → Needs Focus (indicates elevated amotivation)
